byline.original: By ASHLEY PARKER and THOMAS KAPLAN

abstract: Both Sen Tim Kaine and Indiana Gov Mike Pence are spending week before vice-presidential debate undergoing intensive preparation; debate is most high-profile and highly anticipated moment in either of two men's political careers so far.
lead_paragraph: At the debate on Tuesday, the vice-presidential candidates will have to defend their running mates — an especially critical job this time around with such an intense focus on the top of the ticket.
snippet: At the debate on Tuesday, the vice-presidential candidates will have to defend their running mates — an especially critical job this time around with such an intense focus on the top of the ticket....

headline.main: Tim Kaine and Mike Pence Prepare for Vice-Presidential Proxy Fight
headline.print_headline: Pence and Kaine Prepare for Their Day in the Sun, and the Heat That Comes With It
